---

import Badge from '@site/src/components/badges/badges';
import TemplateCard from '@site/src/components/templateCard/templateCard';

<TemplateCard
  fields={27}
  collected={19}
  targetTables={['STUDENT_LOCAL_ASSMNT_SUBTEST']}
  dependencies={[
    { label: 'Student', link: '/docs/templates/student' }
  ]}
/>

## Template Description

This template defines the Student Local Assessment Subtest table in which LEAs will report the results of certain local assessments. Multiple results of the same assessment may be reported for each student provided the assessments are administered on different dates.

:::note
Valid combinations of Test Description, Subtest Area, Subtest Version ID, Score Type, Score, and Score Type Value are listed in [Appendix AR](docs/appendix/appendix-AR.mdx).
:::

## Template Specifications {#template-specs}

### 1 - SUBMITTING AUN
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="required" />
  <Badge variant="key" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={9} />
</div>

The unique, 9-digit AUN assigned by PDE.

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    `123456789`
  </div>
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `DISTRICT CODE`

### 2 - TEST DESCRIPTION
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="required" />
  <Badge variant="key" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={5} />
</div>

The code pertaining to the title or name of the assessment.

:::warning
Must be consistent for all records of an assessment.
:::

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    See [Appendix AR](docs/appendix/appendix-AR.mdx).
  </div>
</details>

### 3 - SCHOOL YEAR DATE
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="required" />
  <Badge variant="key" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={10} />
</div>

A single date (June 30), the last day of the current school year indicating the whole school year.

**eScholar Name**: `ASSESSMENT SCHOOL YEAR DATE`

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    `2024-06-30`
  </div>
</details>

### 4 - SUBTEST SUBJECT AREA
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="required" />
  <Badge variant="key" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={25} />
</div>

Description of the test subject area.

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    See [Appendix AR](docs/appendix/appendix-AR.mdx) for valid values.
  </div>
</details>

### 5 - SUBTEST GRADE LEVEL
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="required" />
  <Badge variant="key" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={15} />
</div>

Grade level for which the test was administered. If the test is applicable to more than one grade level, the student's grade level at the time of the test.

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    See [Appendix K](docs/appendix/appendix-K.mdx).
  </div>
</details>

### 6 - SUBTEST VERSION ID
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="required" />
  <Badge variant="key" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={8} />
</div>

The skill or performance measure for which the score(s) is (are) being reported.

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    See [Appendix AR](docs/appendix/appendix-AR.mdx).
  </div>
</details>

### 7
Field not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

### 8 - SUBTEST IDENTIFIER ORGANIZATION TYPE CODE
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="required" />
  <Badge variant="updateable" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={20} />
</div>

The constant value: 08

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    - `08`
  </div>
</details>

### 9
Field not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

### 10 - PASECUREID
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="required" />
</div>

The unique, 10-digit PAsecureID assigned to the student

**eScholar Name**: `STUDENT ID`

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    - `1000000009`
  </div>
</details>

### 11 - TEST DATE
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="required" />
  <Badge variant="key" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={10} />
</div>

The date the assessment was administered, or the first day of administration if the assessment spans multiple days.

:::warning
Cannot be greater than the current date.
:::

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    - `2023-10-30`
  </div>
</details>

### 12 - STATUS
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="required" />
  <Badge variant="updateable" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={20} />
</div>

Code to identify the source of the data uploaded.

**eScholar Name**: `STUDENT ASSESSMENT STATUS`

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    - `15` - upload file was created by the reporting LEA
    - `16` - upload file was created for the LEA by the assessment provider
  </div>
</details>

### 13-14
Fields not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

### 15 - SCORE TYPE 1
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="conditional" />
  <Badge variant="mandatory" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={3} />
</div>

Defines the type of score being reported as the scaled score.

:::warning
Required if SCORE 1 is reported.
:::

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    See [Appendix AR](docs/appendix/appendix-AR.mdx).
  </div>
</details>

### 16 - SCORE 1
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="optional" />
  <Badge variant="updateable" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={35} />
</div>

The value of the scaled score if reported.

:::warning
Report as a whole number. Decimals and fractions are to be rounded.
:::

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    - `86`
  </div>
</details>

### 17 - SCORE VALUE TYPE 1
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="conditional" />
  <Badge variant="updateable" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={50} />
</div>

The type of score value being reported.

:::warning
Required if SCORE 1 is reported.
:::

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    - `INTEGER`
    - (blank)
  </div>
</details>

### 18-19
Fields not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

### 20 - SCORE TYPE 2
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="conditional" />
  <Badge variant="mandatory" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={3} />
</div>

Defines the type of score being reported as the raw score.

:::warning
Required if SCORE 2 is reported.
:::

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    See [Appendix AR](docs/appendix/appendix-AR.mdx).
  </div>
</details>

### 21 - SCORE 2
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="optional" />
  <Badge variant="updateable" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={35} />
</div>

The value of the raw score if reported.

:::warning
Report as a whole number. Decimals and fractions are to be rounded.
:::

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    - `86`
  </div>
</details>

### 22 - SCORE VALUE TYPE 2
<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="conditional" />
  <Badge variant="updateable" />

<details>

  </div>

<div className="field-badges">
  <Badge variant="conditional" />
  <Badge variant="length" value={50} />
</div>

The type of score value being reported.

:::warning
Required if [SCORE 3](#26---score-3) is reported.
:::

<details>
  <summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>
  <div>
    - `LEVEL`
    - (blank)
  </div>
</details>
